title: Tanagra by Natale Varetti
content:
Hi! Does anyone know this font? It's called Tanagra, designed by Natale Varetti for a typographical contest in 1910 and later published by Nebbiolo in 1924. It's an interesting font, but I can not find pictures or catalogs: I found only this picture of the italics on the internet. None of you happen to have some more pictures?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416152611im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Tanagra%20Italic_5147.jpg)
author: F l a n k e r

comments.content: It bears a more than passing resemblance to Nuptial Script.

Mhmm, yes, like Garamond resembles Times New Roman...  
Like I said, this is the Italic, not the Roman.
